DocumentByIndex: Requires 1-indexed integer argument. Returns Document object

Document.Broadcast: Accepts 'start' and 'stop', starts and stops broadcasting of parent Document
Document.IsBroadcasting: Returns 1 or 0 depending on if current Document is Broadcasting
Document.ArchiveToDisk: Accepts 'start' and 'stop', starts and stops recordinging of parent Document
Document.IsArchivingToDisk: Returns 1 or 0 depending on if current Document is recording
Document.LayerByIndex: Requires 1-indexed integer argument. Returns Layer object
